metadata.title: CVE-2024-26641 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ip6_tunnel: make sure to pull inner header in __ip6_tnl_rcv()syzbot found __ip6_tnl_rcv() could access unitiliazed data [1].Call pskb_inet_may_pull() to fix this, and initialize ipv6hvariable after this call as it can change skb->head.[1] BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in
